text.section: When registered with the Administration, every multipurpose passenger vehicle is a Class M (multipurpose) vehicle.

For each Class M (multipurpose) vehicle, the annual registration fee is:
For a vehicle with a manufacturer's shipping weight of 3,700 pounds or less - $50.50; and
For a vehicle with a manufacturer's shipping weight of more than 3,700 pounds - $76.50.
The Administration may by rule and regulation provide for the registration under this section of all multipurpose passenger vehicles registered under another category.
